title: ComplyTime Relationship Metadata Standard
description: Standard metadata requirements for ComplyTime CALM architecture relationships. Enforces consistent documentation of interaction types, directionality, and data contracts.

interaction_type.description: Type of interaction between nodes (Synchronous for request-response, Asynchronous for event-driven)

direction.description: Direction of the relationship from the source node's perspective (inbound = receiving, outbound = sending)

data_contract.description: Description of the data contract for this relationship (e.g., 'OTLP Log Records', 'Gemara Layer 2/3 YAML')
